QuestData.Title: Whispers of a Frightened World
QuestData.Description: "Champion! Azeroth needs our help."$b$b<Magni Bronzebeard's words echo in your mind, as if rising from somewhere deep and ancient. Azeroth's world soul seeks to deliver a warning to the Speaker, but some force is interfering with the message.>$b$b<Magni has urged you to travel to Sholazar Basin, the vibrant heart of frozen Northrend, to aid him.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Magni in Sholazar Basin and hear the warning.

Objectives.Objective: Meet Magni in The Maker's Overlook
Take the Dalaran portal to Wyrmrest Temple
